pages.title: Trees
pages.text: - Trees grow progressively from seeds to mature trees over time.$(br2)- Trees grow around obstacles in a natural way.$(br2)- Trees have growth rate and mature sizes that are biome, temperature and rainfall dependent.$(br2)- Drop seeds at random that can potentially plant themselves.

- Trees won't grow in darkness. Leaves not connected to an outer tree branch or starved of light will die. Outer branches without leaves slowly rot away.$(br2)- Walking on leaves blocks is slow and sinking. Falling onto leaves prevents fall damage and breaks the leaf block.$(br2)- Vanilla Tree Fruits(apples, cocoa beans)$(br2)- Thin branches can be climbed like ladders.
